What factors are most important to you w: When choosing where to open a deposit account, the most important factors to me are the interest rates, fees, and convenience. I want to make sure that I'm earning the highest possible interest on my savings, while also avoiding any unnecessary fees. What are some concerns you have about op: As someone who values financial security, one concern I might have about opening a deposit account with your credit union is the stability and reputation of the institution. I would want to make sure that the credit union is financially sound and has a good track record of serving its members.
